title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + PRODUCING THE CAR STORY: techniques and alternatives to print
description: Stuart Watson, an investigative reporter from WCNC-TV in Charlotte, NC, shares insights from the 2011 IRE CAR Conference in Raleigh, NC, focusing on the importance of storytelling, simplicity, and character development in computer-assisted reporting.
